articles.description: Eskom, described by Goldman Sachs as the biggest threat to the South African economy, has become mired in over R480bn debt. With the majority of its bonds being government guaranteed, the state is obliged to step in when Eskom anticipates payment pressure
articles.title: Rescuing Eskom: Bondholders take comfort in state guarantee they will 'get paid' - News24
